00001 #include "ros/ros.h"
00002 #include "last_letter/calc_force.h"
00003 #include "last_letter/calc_air_data.h"
00004 #include "last_letter/c_lift_a.h"
00005 #include "last_letter/c_drag_a.h"
00006 #include "nav_msgs/Odometry.h"
00007 #include "geometry_msgs/Vector3.h"
00008 #include "geometry_msgs/Quaternion.h"
00009 #include "tf/transform_datatypes.h"
00010 //#include "LinearMath/btMatrix3x3.h"
00011 #include <cstdlib>
00012 #include <math.h>
00013 #include "mathutils/utls.hpp"

00015 ros::ServiceClient airDataClient, liftClient, dragClient;
00016 
00017 bool calc_force_callback(last_letter::calc_force::Request &req, last_letter::calc_force::Response &res)
00018 {
00019 
00020         //initializing inputs           
00021         nav_msgs::Odometry states = req.states;
00022         double inputs[4];
00023         inputs[0] = req.inputs[0];
00024         inputs[1] = req.inputs[1];
00025         inputs[2] = req.inputs[2];
00026         inputs[3] = req.inputs[3];
00027         
00028         //request air data from getAirData server
00029         last_letter::calc_air_data airDataService;
00030         airDataService.request.speeds = req.states.twist.twist.linear;
00031         if (!airDataClient.call(airDataService)){
00032                 ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service calc_air_data in %s","force_server");
00033         }
00034         double airspeed = airDataService.response.airspeed;
00035         double alpha = airDataService.response.alpha;
00036         double beta = airDataService.response.beta;
00037         
00038         //split control input values
00039         double deltaa = inputs[0];
00040         double deltae = inputs[1];
00041         double deltat = inputs[2];
00042         double deltar = inputs[3];
00043         
00044         //request lift and drag alpha-coefficients from the corresponding server
00045         last_letter::c_lift_a liftService;
00046         liftService.request.alpha = alpha;
00047         if (!liftClient.call(liftService)){
00048                 ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service c_lift_a in %s","force_server");
00049         }
00050         double c_lift_a = liftService.response.c_lift_a;
00051         
00052         last_letter::c_drag_a dragService;
00053         dragService.request.alpha = alpha;
00054         if (!dragClient.call(dragService)){
00055                 ROS_ERROR("Failed to call service c_drag_a in %s","force_server");
00056         }       
00057         double c_drag_a = dragService.response.c_drag_a;
00058 
00059         //read from parameter server
00060         double rho,g,m;
00061         double c_lift_q,c_lift_deltae,c_drag_q,c_drag_deltae;
00062         double c,b,s;
00063         double c_y_0,c_y_b,c_y_p,c_y_r,c_y_deltaa,c_y_deltar;
00064         double s_prop,c_prop,k_motor;
00065         
00066         ros::param::getCached("/world/rho",rho);
00067         ros::param::getCached("/world/g",g);
00068         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/m",m);
00069         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_lift_q",c_lift_q);
00070         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_lift_deltae",c_lift_deltae);
00071         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_drag_q",c_drag_q);
00072         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_drag_deltae",c_drag_deltae);
00073         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c",c);
00074         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/b",b);
00075         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/s",s);
00076         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_y_0",c_y_0);
00077         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_y_b",c_y_b);
00078         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_y_p",c_y_p);
00079         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_y_r",c_y_r);
00080         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_y_deltaa",c_y_deltaa);
00081         ros::param::getCached("/airframe/c_y_deltar",c_y_deltar);
00082         ros::param::getCached("/motor/s_prop",s_prop);
00083         ros::param::getCached("/motor/c_prop",c_prop);
00084         ros::param::getCached("/motor/k_motor",k_motor);
00085         
00086         //convert coefficients to the body frame
00087         double c_x_a = -c_drag_a*cos(alpha)-c_lift_a*sin(alpha);
00088         double c_x_q = -c_drag_q*cos(alpha)-c_lift_q*sin(alpha);
00089         double c_x_deltae = -c_drag_deltae*cos(alpha)-c_lift_deltae*sin(alpha);
00090         double c_z_a = -c_drag_a*sin(alpha)-c_lift_a*cos(alpha);
00091         double c_z_q = -c_drag_q*sin(alpha)-c_lift_q*cos(alpha);
00092         double c_z_deltae = -c_drag_deltae*sin(alpha)-c_lift_deltae*cos(alpha);
00093         
00094         //read orientation and convert to Euler angles
00095         geometry_msgs::Quaternion quat = states.pose.pose.orientation;
00096         geometry_msgs::Vector3 eulerVect;
00097         double phi,theta,psi;
00098         quat2euler(quat, &eulerVect);
00099         phi = eulerVect.x;
00100         theta = eulerVect.y;
00101         psi = eulerVect.z;
00102         
00103         //read angular rates
00104         double p = states.twist.twist.angular.x;
00105         double q = states.twist.twist.angular.y;
00106         double r = states.twist.twist.angular.z;                
00107         
00108         //calculate gravity force
00109         double Reb[9];
00110         quat2rotmtx(quat,Reb);  
00111         geometry_msgs::Vector3 gravVect;
00112         gravVect.z = m*g;
00113         geometry_msgs::Vector3 gravForce = Reb/gravVect;
00114         //quat_vector3_rotate(quat, gravVect, &gravForce);
00115         double gx = gravForce.x;
00116         double gy = gravForce.y;
00117         double gz = gravForce.z;                
00118         //double gx = -m*g*sin(theta);
00119         //double gy = m*g*cos(theta)*sin(phi);
00120         //double gz = m*g*cos(theta)*cos(phi);
00121         
00122         //calculate aerodynamic force
00123         double qbar = 1.0/2.0*rho*pow(airspeed,2)*s; //Calculate dynamic pressure
00124         double ax, ay, az;
00125         if (airspeed==0)
00126         {
00127                 ax = 0;
00128                 ay = 0;
00129                 az = 0;                         
00130         }
00131         else
00132         {
00133                 ax = qbar*(c_x_a + c_x_q*c*q/(2*airspeed) + c_x_deltae*deltae);
00134                 ay = qbar*(c_y_0 + c_y_b*beta + c_y_p*b*p/(2*airspeed) + c_y_r*b*r/(2*airspeed) + c_y_deltaa*deltaa + c_y_deltar*deltar);
00135                 az = qbar*(c_z_a + c_z_q*c*q/(2*airspeed) + c_z_deltae*deltae);
00136         }
00137         
00138         //Calculate Thrust force
00139         double tx = 1.0/2.0*rho*s_prop*c_prop*(pow(k_motor*deltat,2)-pow(airspeed,2));
00140         double ty = 0;
00141         double tz = 0;
00142 
00143         //Sum forces
00144         double fx = gx+ax+tx;
00145         double fy = gy+ay+ty;
00146         double fz = gz+az+tz;
00147         
00148         res.force.x = fx;
00149         res.force.y = fy;
00150         res.force.z = fz;
00151 
00152         return true;
00153 }
00154 
00155 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00156 {
00157         ros::init(argc, argv, "calc_force_server");
00158         ros::NodeHandle n;
00159 
00160         ros::ServiceServer service = n.advertiseService("calc_force",calc_force_callback);
00161         airDataClient = n.serviceClient<last_letter::calc_air_data>("calc_air_data");
00162         liftClient = n.serviceClient<last_letter::c_lift_a>("c_lift_a");
00163         dragClient = n.serviceClient<last_letter::c_drag_a>("c_drag_a");        
00164         ROS_INFO("calc_force_server ready");
00165         ros::spin();
00166 
00167         return 0;
00168 }
